item.title: How do i make a teleport give u items
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

case 6282:
if (objectX == 2961 && objectY == 3393)
{
sendMessage(“Happy halloween!”);
teleportToX = 2907;
teleportToY = 9693;
addItem(1419, 1);
}
break;

what do i add to that code to make it give you a scythe (scythe item id is 1419)
